description.en: Position 6 balls from your kit at the 6 circles on the challenge field. Your task is to push the balls into the center field with the help of a cup from your kit. Your robot has to hold the cup upside down, cover one ball with it then push the cup - and the ball under it- to the center.

Push one ball at a time.
Each ball has to be kept within the center field by the end of the challenge.
You have got 3 trials.

You finished within 2 minutes. = Good job! Let's try again.
You finished within 1.5 minutes. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
You finished within less then 1 minute. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
You finished within 2 minutes. = 5 points
You finished within 1.5 minutes. = 10 points
You finished within less then 1 minute. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
